metadata.title: CVE-2024-43905 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/pm: Fix the null pointer dereference for vega10_hwmgrCheck return value and conduct null pointer handling to avoid null pointerdereference.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-50.51').
linux-aws package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-1019.21').
linux-gke package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-1015.19').
linux-ibm package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-50.51.1').
linux-oracle package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oem-6.8 package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-intel package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
